transArray.content: Clean and hygienic, the service is very good, the breakfast is also very good, mineral water was given when leaving the hotel, very warm and satisfying

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Thank you very much for your recognition of the hotel rooms and staff services. Everything we do is to provide every guest with a home-like experience. The products and services we deliver are of reliable quality. Cleanliness and safety come first. Thank you very much for your recognition of the breakfast in the hotel. Only when you live well and eat well can you feel at home. We are really touched to see your satisfaction and affirmation. We will continue to work hard and be ready for you to come back at any time. All the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel are looking forward to your next stay. Thank you! General Manager: Li Changxia
